Package millionaire.Model

Interface GetJson

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game
interface GetJson
This interface have methods that will handle getting a Json data from the server (game questions).
Author:
Mohammad.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void getJsonText​(java.lang.String url)
    It will get json text from a page that have json data(backend)
    void setupJsonData​(java.lang.String data)
    It will have behavior to handle json (data) text for example set every json object in a question object from questions array inside game class.
    default java.lang.String[] toStringArray​(org.json.JSONArray jsonArray)
    It will convert Json array to string array (used to get question options from every question object from json text).

  • Method Details

    • getJsonText

      default void getJsonText​(java.lang.String url)
      It will get json text from a page that have json data(backend)
      Parameters:
      url - refer to the page that show json text.

    • toStringArray

      default java.lang.String[] toStringArray​(org.json.JSONArray jsonArray)
      It will convert Json array to string array (used to get question options from every question object from json text).
      Parameters:
      jsonArray - json array that will be returned as a string array.
      Returns:
      string array.

    • setupJsonData

      void setupJsonData​(java.lang.String data)
      It will have behavior to handle json (data) text for example set every json object in a question object from questions array inside game class.(It will be called inside getJsonData() when the data will be ready to use).
      Parameters:
      data - is a json text that will used inside this method.
